custom-meta.meta-value: CMIP5 climate projections are freely available at: http://www-pcmdi.llnl.gov/. Socio-conomic data are freely available at: http://www.isee.nc/population/population.html, or upon request to: isee@isee.nc. Observed meteorological data are available for researchers and students upon request to Météo France Nouvelle-Calédonie. The request must be performed through their website at: http://www.meteo.nc/donnees-publiques-enseignement. Epidemiological data are available upon request to the Health Department of the Direction of Sanitary and Social Affairs (DASS-NC) for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data by writing to: Service des actions sanitaires DASS-NC BP N4 98851 NOUMEA Cedex. Data is not fully available without restrictions: legal restrictions exist, as the authorisation from the Department of Sanitary and Social Affairs of New Caledonia (DASS-NC) is required to access epidemiological data.
